attributes.action: Help the people of this country in debt despair
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of pouring billions into the banking system to shore that up, why not use some of that money to help people (like me) who have found themselves in debt with no hope of extricating themselves from it and the debt is as a result of things like divorce, redundancy, CSA and retraining, all of which have befallen me.
